漢羅台文: 官方對語言政策尊存的程度是本土語言活命的鋩角，
台羅: kuann-hong tuì gí-giân tsìng-tshik tsun-tshûn ê thîng-tōo sī pún-thóo gí-giân ua̍h-miā ê mê-kak,
台羅數字調: kuann1-hong1 tui3 gi2-gian5 tsing3-tshik4 tsun1-tshun5 e5 thing5-too7 si7 pun2-thoo2 gi2-gian5 uah8-mia7 e5 me5-kak4,
白話字: koaⁿ-hong tùi gí-giân chèng-chhek chun-chhûn ê thêng-tō͘ sī pún-thó͘ gí-giân oa̍h-miā ê mê-kak,
